long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop missing out on promotions because you don't keep track of your daily activities at work! Impact Tracker is the easiest way to track what you're doing at work each day so you can prove to your boss you deserve that promotion!

A tab will automatically pop up in your browser at a time you choose each day for you to enter in your accomplishments for the day. You don't have to remember to do it, or spend time navigating to some other website or software.
